The name of the Bulletin is not specifically mentioned in the provided page. However, according to the 15th point under the heading 'CONCLUSION' it is the OMB Risk Assessment Bulletin. 

This information can be found in the 15th point which starts with the sentence "The U.S. Chamber of Commerce Press Statement. U.S. Chamber. OMB Risk Assessment Bulletin Must Be Judicially Reviewable. May 18, 2006."
